channel.title: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!
channel.description: Alright, so.. I've just started a server, portforwarded, set up no-ip and everything. Reason others can login. I've read through posts on here as well as everywhere else on the internet. Tried everything i've seen, nothing helped. People can login my server with absolutely no problem, but then when it comes time, and i try to login, i get "error Connecting to server". I'm atm using a webclient off of rspscoding, got the loader correct and everything. Pretty lost. Can anyone help me out? If i've left an important part out u guys need to know to help solve this, just ask in the comments. Thanks.

item.title: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Hurries I Am Hurries
item.description:
@I_Am_Hurries wrote:

[quote=“i call dueces, post:3, topic:528213”]is it a matrix server?
my friend had the same problem, so i told him just login with localhost (127.0.0.1)
worked for him[/quote]

You’re correct. If hosting a server on your computer you cannot connect.
If hosting a server on a VPS then change the IP to the VPS IP.
~Cheers!

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!

item.title: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @i_call_dueces i call dueces
item.description:
@i_call_dueces wrote:

is it a matrix server?
my friend had the same problem, so i told him just login with localhost (127.0.0.1)
worked for him

item.source: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!

item.title: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!
item.dc:creator: @N_A_W_R_A_S N A W R A S
item.description:
@N_A_W_R_A_S wrote:

Nike274:

Alright, so… I’ve just started a server, portforwarded, set up no-ip and everything. Reason others can login. I’ve read through posts on here as well as everywhere else on the internet. Tried everything i’ve seen, nothing helped. People can login my server with absolutely no problem, but then when it comes time, and i try to login, i get “error Connecting to server”. I’m atm using a webclient off of rspscoding, got the loader correct and everything. Pretty lost. Can anyone help me out? If i’ve left an important part out u guys need to know to help solve this, just ask in the comments. Thanks.

Well that’s weird, your friends can play, but you cant?
For the time being, try to download a suitable client for your server, and try to connect to 127.0.0.1 or localhost, it must work.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't Login Server But Others Can ! Help Please!
